column2:
$WHERE$ gets §Y$WHAT$§! until §Y$DATE$§!, giving the following effects:
$EFFECT$
Our country enforces policies that prevent minorities from constructing permanent buildings, even on land they own.
Old man Dryzymala avoids the building ban by living in a wagon
Our school system discriminates against citizens who are not of our national culture.
An underground organisation provides higher education in a minority language
Justifying wars can be done faster
The World Bank, tag FOR, needs to be at the bottom of the list in terms of points. Otherwise, everyone below them is absolutely screwed.

Recently we have recruited leaders from out nobility and outstanding officers. In order to allow the recruitment pool to swell in ranks again to a sizeable level, we ought to wait before recruiting any more generals.

Recently we have recruited leaders from out nobility and outstanding officers. In order to allow the recruitment pool to swell in ranks again to a sizeable level, we ought to wait before recruiting any more admirals.
The number of soldiers joining the realm's armed forces has waned in recent years. §RThis modifier lets you know that you have a country flag that limits soldier pops to 3% until it is removed§!
A member of our realm is part of the Fellowship of the Ring!
When this modifier disappears, the War of the Ring starts!
War of the Ring End Countdown
When this modifier disappears, the War of the Ring will end!
